Home » 13S4 Saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta » 1.4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 1.4.2 Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
1.4.2.56 Ajjhattāyatanadukkhasutta
Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
Ajjhattāyatanadukkhasutta
223.
915“Cakkhu, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ…pe…  jivhā dukkhā…pe…  mano dukkho. Evaṃ passaṃ…pe…  nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
